Articles.Content:
I just made a short video showing off a simple space plane taking-off and landing. Feel free to give me any constructive criticism.

Thanks! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/UhFp1EiO1mg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
Are you using a keyboard or joystick?
I\'m using a keyboard. I do own a decent joystick at home but I still haven\'t really learned using it with KSP.
Without proper runway lights or nav aids, it\'s pretty hard to see the runway. So I left some debris out in the water close to the center line. These 'approach debris' really help me to get lined up.
I do the same thing. I just wanted the video to be clean and debrisless. I should have shown it ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
